mapper.select: /* ArtiseeProdSpecMapper.getArtiseeProdSpecList */ SELECT tcn.NMCODE_CD AS SPEC_CD, tcn.NMCODE_NM AS SPEC_NM, (SELECT COUNT(thps.PROD_CD) FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_SPEC thps WHERE thps.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND thps.SPEC_CD = tcn.NMCODE_CD) AS PROD_CNT FROM TB_CM_NMCODE tcn WHERE 1=1 AND tcn.NMCODE_GRP_CD = '236' ORDER BY tcn.NMCODE_CD

/* ArtiseeProdSpecMapper.getArtiseeProdSpecProdList */ SELECT thps.PROD_CD, thp.PROD_NM FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_SPEC thps, TB_HQ_PRODUCT thp WHERE 1=1 AND thps.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND thps.SPEC_CD = #{specCd} AND thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD (+)= thps.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND thp.PROD_CD (+)= thps.PROD_CD ORDER BY thps.PROD_CD
mapper.insert: /* ArtiseeProdSpecMapper.getArtiseeProdSpecProdSaveInsert */ INSERT INTO TB_HQ_PRODUCT_SPEC ( HQ_OFFICE_CD, SPEC_CD, PROD_CD, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) VALUES ( #{hqOfficeCd}, #{specCd}, #{prodCd}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )
